root.name: Gradius Collection
root.description: Gradius Collection is a compilation of the following Gradius games: Gradius (1985) Gradius II (1988) Gradius III (1989) Gradius Gaiden (1997, never released outside Japan before this compilation) Gradius IV (1999)Besides the games themselves, there are additional features like a music player and a video player for viewing the different cut scenes from the games.
